item.splinecart.track_ties.desc: Use Track Tools to customize when placed. Shift place for precise alignment.
item.splinecart.track.desc: Links two Track Marker blocks together.
item.splinecart.track.desc1: Left click on first one, right click on second one.
item.splinecart.heading_tool.desc: Changes the heading (horizontal orientation) of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.heading_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.pitching_tool.desc: Changes the Pitching (vertical orientation) of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.pitching_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.banking_tool.desc: Changes the banking of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.banking_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.relative_orientation_too: Changes the heading relative to the pitching of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_style_tool.desc: Changes the look of the Track following this Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_style_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click to apply to ALL following Track Pieces.
item.splinecart.track_type_tool.desc: Changes the type (normal, chainlift, etc) of the Track following this Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_type_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click to apply to ALL following Track Pieces.
item.splinecart.track_power_tool.desc: Changes the Power (i. e. speed of chainlift) of the Track following this Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_power_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.track_strength_tool.desc: Changes the setting (i. e. acceleration of a magnetic track) of the Track following this Track Marker.
Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.trigger_tool.desc: Lets you add triggers to Track Markers that activate when being driven over.
item.splinecart.trigger_tool.desc1: Left click to select marker that will be changed, Right click to add trigger to marker and Shift right click to clear.
item.splinecart.coaster_cart.desc: Right click to place on Track Marker. It retains the last velocity
item.splinecart.coaster_cart.desc1: Left click to automatically enter Cart.
config.splinecart.rotate_camera.desc: Recommended to be set to 'false' for users prone to motion sickness. When set to 'false', your player camera orientation will remain level while riding a non-level track. Non-level tracks are best experienced in third person when 'rotate_camera' is set to 'false'.
config.splinecart.rotate_camera.name: Rotate Camera
config.splinecart.track_resolution.desc: Higher values decrease performance and increase visual quality. Determines how many segments tracks will be cut into when rendering, with fewer segments making tracks appear jagged. Does not affect minecart movement along tracks.
config.splinecart.track_resolution.name: Track Resolution
When the Track Marker block is this many chunks away from you, its track will stop rendering.
config.splinecart.show_track_overlay.des: Set to 'false' to hide the Track Marker marker overlay. This can alternatively be done temporarily by pressing F1. Track Markers with no track connected will still be shown.
config.splinecart.suspended_view.desc: Moves the camera below the track when riding a coaster cart so that it looks like your riding a suspended coaster. The minecart and player themselves will still be rendered normally.
config.splinecart.suspended_view.name: Suspended View
config.splinecart.show_speed_info.desc: If set to false, hides the speed info display when riding a coaster cart.
config.splinecart.show_speed_info.name: Show Speed Info
config.splinecart.show_speed_info_peak.d: If set to true, shows the peak speed (highest and lowest) that the cart had reached on a hill or valley.
If set to true, shows the force in G that the cart experiences.
config.splinecart.show_imperial.desc: If set to true, shows all the speed values the actionbar in imperial (doesn't change values entered with a Power Tool).
config.splinecart.show_imperial.name: Show Imperial
gamerule.coasterFriction: The friction that coaster carts experience
